message: Let's start with a fair split. Accept and we can end the game early.
You wanted to start with a fair split, but I think I can do better. Consider this a compromise.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more given the inflation. Accept and we can move on.
You're trying to take advantage of inflation, but I'm not falling for it. I'll give you a slightly better offer, but don't think you're getting off that easy.
It's getting late, and I'm not getting any younger. Let's meet in the middle and end this already.
I'm not going to meet you in the middle, Alice. I think I can get a better deal than that. You're running out of time.
I'm taking a risk, but I think I can get a better deal than this. Take it or leave it!
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm not going to let you take advantage of me. This is my final offer, and it's not going to get any better.
This is my final offer. Take it or we both walk away with nothing. Don't think about it, just accept.

I'll take whatever I can get at this point. Take it and let's end this.
